to.sven.androidrccar.common.communication.contract

Interface IRemoteCommunicationListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLogic

    public interface IRemoteCommunicationListener
    The RemoteCommunication uses this listener to inform the implementor of this interface that something happens. (Usually AbstractLogic)
    Author:
    sven

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connectionProblem(java.lang.Exception ex)
      Called from the RemoteCommunication when a problem with the exception occurs.
      void messageReceived(Message message)
      Called from the RemoteCommunication when a message is received.
